titleNullable: Chest X-ray Image(COVID19, PNEUMONIA, and NORMAL)
subtitleNullable: A Comprehensive Dataset for AI-driven Analysis of Chest X-ray Images
descriptionNullable:
**In order to compile a publicly accessible dataset comprising chest X-ray and CT images of patients who have tested positive for COVID-19 or are suspected of having other viral and bacterial pneumonias (MERS, SARS, and ARDS). In addition to gathering information from public sources, data will be gathered indirectly from physicians and institutions.**

![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F15584165%2F42f3185248f0372d72a92987baae29c1%2F__results___28_1.png?generation=1701248612960017&alt=media)

#Content:
**Train and test are the two folders containing the Content Dataset, while each contains three subfolders: COVID19, PNEUMONIA, and NORMAL. The dataset comprises a total of 6432 x-ray images, of which 20% are designated as test data.**


# Credits and acknowledgments
Images are gathered from a variety of publicly accessible sources. When utilising the data for research purposes, kindly attribute the authors:

# Sources: 
- https://github.com/ieee8023/covid-chestxray-dataset
- https://www.kaggle.com/paultimothymooney/chest-xray-pneumonia
- https://github.com/agchung
